resources.string: This application will show you how a FridgeTag works. Click the ">" button to continue.

Pressing READ once displays the highest temperature reached and the cumulative time duration in hours and minutes that the temperature was above the given upper limit for the current day that is today.
You have completed the Refrigerator Tags training application! Press next to exit.

string-array.name: custom_tags_instructions
string-array.item: There are 2 buttons on the FridgeTag - a SET and READ button. The SET button is used mainly during device setup, and the READ button is used to view the history of the device.
The Alarm state will show either "OK" or "ALARM" based on the current status of the FridgeTag, or the status at a given point in time when in history mode
The Time/Alarm Duration displays the current time, or the amount of time the since the temperature has exceeded one of the limits
The Temp/Min-Max shows the current temperature of the FridgeTag or the max/min temperature reached during an alarm period
The alarm icons indicate how long ago a cold/hot alarm was registered. Use the scale at the top to determine what day they occurred. ▲ indicates a high alarm; ▼ indicates a low alarm
You have now completed the FridgeTag overview. Press > to continue
